data.eml:eml: Redescription of Minosiella intermedia Denis, 1958 (Araneae: Gnaphosidae) with first description of the male

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marusik, Yuri M., Kovblyuk, Mykola M. (2009): Redescription of Minosiella intermedia Denis, 1958 (Araneae: Gnaphosidae) with first description of the male. Zootaxa 2291: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191432
